thread.title: 12 jobs where you play all day

title: 12 jobs where you play all day
text:
Topix › Entertainment › 12 jobs where you play all day 12 jobs where you play all day Next Story Prev Story 14 hrs ago Read more: USA Today 
As much as we may dream about it, no job is 100% fun and games. There are, however, a number of well-paying, respectable careers out there that have a particular knack for "play" - literally and figuratively. Start the conversation, or Read more at USA Today.
